courseSectionInformation: Same as LA 563. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in architecture, landscape architecture, or urban and regional planning.
description: Introduction to methods and techniques of systematically generating social and behavioral information relevant to the programming, design, and evaluation of physical environments. Same as LA 563. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in architecture, landscape architecture, or urban and regional planning.
label: Soc/Beh Research Designed Env
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign. Restricted to PHD:Lndscpe Architecture -UIUC, PHD:Architecture -UIUC, PHD:Regional Planning -UIUC, or MS: Architectural Studies-UIUC.
